pr_title: Added test.yml file for live test pipeline

timeline.message: test if the live tests can run

timeline.bodyText: Please check with @conniey too before proceeding with this approach since Event Hubs also has similar issue and Connie is looking into writing a script to skip live tests for dependencies outside of the current module's area.
timeline.author: srnagar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -92,7 +94,7 @@ jobs:
       - task: Maven@3
         displayName: $(DisplayName)
         inputs:
-          mavenPomFile: sdk/${{parameters.ServiceDirectory}}/pom.service.xml
+          mavenPomFile: ${{ parameters.MavenPom}} #${{ parameters.MavenPom}} 'sdk/${{parameters.ServiceDirectory}}/azure-search/pom.xml' 'sdk/${{parameters.ServiceDirectory}}/pom.service.xml'

replies.bodyText: Yep. What we should be doing here is using the -pl and -am switches in our pipelines to scope the test runs more appropriately. And Connie is cooking that up right now.
replies.author: mitchdenny

replies.bodyText: #8190 is the PR that should fix this. :)
replies.author: conniey

timeline.message: Setup up live test mode in search

timeline.bodyText:
Not this PR and for documentation purposes.
A RetryPolicy should be implicitly added in the builder, right now this will cause the create pipeline to have two retry policies.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText:
Not this PR and for documentation purposes.
This change would ideally be done by setting the HttpLogOptions within the builder. Right now this will cause the generated pipeline to have two logging policies which is less than ideal when running live tests with logging on.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.bodyText: Given that we've done a live test run about how long did it take to complete? We don't want to have timeouts that are too long in cases where tests deadlock and hold a DevOps VMs for longer than needed. Is it possible to use the default timeout of 60 minutes for the Search live tests?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
+trigger: none
+
+jobs:
+    - template: ../../eng/pipelines/templates/jobs/archetype-sdk-tests.yml
+      parameters:
+          ServiceDirectory: search
+          DisableAzureResourceCreation: true
+          Timeout: 120

replies.bodyText: Search is depending storage currently, so 60 minute usually cannot finish search tests. Besides of that, search also takes long time to run, which might need to improve in future.
replies.author: sima-zhu

timeline.bodyText: Should this be replaced with the isLiveMode method in InterceptorManager?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: Yes. Try to replace with the one.
replies.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: My concern is next release will depend on azure-core-test. So I put a helper method currently in search. Will move to interceptorManager.isLiveMode once azure-core-test is released.
replies.author: sima-zhu

timeline.bodyText: yml files are space sensitive, this is using the wrong character offset. This will either lead to a parsing exception or the configuration being ignored.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,9 +3,9 @@
 
 resources:
   repositories:
-    # - repository: azure-sdk-build-tools
-    #   type: git
-    #   name: internal/azure-sdk-build-tools
+     - repository: azure-sdk-build-tools
+       type: git
+       name: internal/azure-sdk-build-tools

timeline.bodyText: yml files are space sensitive, this is using the wrong character offset. This will either lead to a parsing exception or the configuration being ignored.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
+trigger: none
+
+jobs:
+    - template: ../../eng/pipelines/templates/jobs/archetype-sdk-tests.yml
+      parameters:
+          ServiceDirectory: search
+          DisableAzureResourceCreation: true
+          Timeout: 120
+          EnvVars:
+              AZURE_TEST_MODE: LIVE
+              AZURE_TENANT_ID: $(aad-azure-sdk-test-tenant-id)
+              AZURE_CLIENT_ID: $(aad-azure-sdk-test-client-id)
+              AZURE_CLIENT_SECRET: $(aad-azure-sdk-test-client-secret)
+              AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID: $(aad-azure-sdk-test-subscription-id)

timeline.bodyText:
Could we add a maxParallel configuration and set it to 2, maybe 3.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/yaml-schema?view=azure-devops&tabs=schema#matrix
FYI @tg-msft, this should help reduce the number of concurrent testing jobs happening at the same time.
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: Set to 3 for initial check in
replies.author: sima-zhu
